sp_rel_widget_clone.payload: c.cm-browse-forum-tiles { text-align: center; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; .cm-header { font-size: 24px; font-weight: normal; margin-top: 25px; margin-bottom: 25px; .fa { color: $csm-icon-color; margin-left: 5px; } } .cm-forum-tiles { .cm-forum-list{ list-style-type:none; margin:0; padding:0; } .cm-tile-container { padding: 0px 10px; } .forum-tile { height: 160px; padding: 10px 15px; overflow-y: hidden; .forum-tile-link { display: block; .link-image { padding-top: 27px; img{ height: 50px; } } .link-image-with-subforum{ padding-top:10px; img{ height: 50px; } } .link-text { line-height: 20px; //height: 50px; p { margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; //white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; color:$text-color; } } } } .cm-hide-me { display: none; } } .cm-show-more { margin-bottom: 25px; } } .cm-change-color{ color: $text-color; } .self-clear:after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } .link-text { height: 50px; display: block; /* or inline-block */ word-wrap: break-word; overflow: hidden; display: -webkit-inline-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; text-overflow: ellipsis; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; } .cm-subforum-seperator{ margin: 0px; margin-bottom: 5px; } .fa-caret-right{ margin-left:5px; }sp_instancefalsecommunity-browse-forum-tilesfalseCommunity - Browse Forum Tiles[{"name":"rows_count","default_value":"2","label":"Number of rows displayed","type":"string"},{"name":"max_no_of_rows","default_value":"10","label":"Maximum number of forums displayed","type":"string"}]truefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-01-19 15:20:26da3c182f535032007a97e192d5dc3414230Community - Browse Forum Tiles10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904read10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904sp_widget_da3c182f535032007a97e192d5dc3414admin2019-03-21 10:02:05

sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_a20ebbd5dbd45410730a7b386896197d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Titan Browse Forums">aa0ebbd5dbd45410730a7b386896197a</child><cloned>2020-04-20 09:07:38</cloned><last_validated>2020-04-20 09:07:38</last_validated><parent display_value="Community - Browse Forum Tiles">da3c182f535032007a97e192d5dc3414</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope, $http, $location, $rootScope) {
	/* widget controller */
	var c = this;
	var apiBaseUrl = '/api/sn_communities/v1/community',
			queryParams = $location.search(),
			maxRowCount = parseInt(c.options.max_no_of_rows),
		    maxRowsToDisplay = parseInt(c.options.rows_count);
	        
	c.collapseWidget = true;
	c.condensedMode = true;
	
	c.countToShow = maxRowsToDisplay * 4;
	
	//Fetch the Forums
	c.fetchForums = function(){
		$http.get(apiBaseUrl + '/forums?getImages=1&depth_level=1&getSubForumCounts=1&limit='+maxRowCount)
			.then(function(data){
			c.forums = data.data.result;
			if(c.data.accessibilityOn)
				c.countToShow = c.forums ? c.forums.length : c.countToShow;
		}, function(error){
			console.error(error);
		});
	}


	c.expandWidget = function(){
		if(c.collapseWidget && !c.forums)
			c.fetchForums();
		c.collapseWidget = !c.collapseWidget;
		if(c.collapseWidget){
			$('.cm-minus').each(function(i){
					$(this).attr('tabindex',-1);
				}
			);
			$('.cm-plus').each(function(i){
					$(this).removeAttr('tabindex');
					$(this).focus();
				}
			);
		}
		else{
			$('.cm-plus').each(function(i){
					$(this).attr('tabindex',-1);
				}
			);
			$('.cm-minus').each(function(i){
					$(this).removeAttr('tabindex');
					$(this).focus();
				}
			);
		}
		
	};
	
	//When accessibility mode is on list all the available forum
	if(c.data.accessibilityOn) {
		c.collapseWidget = true;
		c.condensedMode = false;
		c.countToShow = c.forums ? c.forums.length : c.countToShow;
		c.expandWidget();
	}

}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.cm-browse-forum-tiles {
  text-align: center;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  .cm-header {
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: normal;
    margin-top: 25px;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
    .fa {
      color: $csm-icon-color;
      margin-left: 5px;
    }
  }
  .cm-forum-tiles {
    .cm-forum-list{
      list-style-type:none;
      margin:0;
      padding:0;
    }
    .cm-tile-container {
      padding: 0px 10px;
    }
    .forum-tile {
      height: 160px;
      padding: 10px 15px;
      overflow-y: hidden;
      .forum-tile-link {
        display: block;
        .link-image {
          padding-top: 27px;
          img{
            height: 50px;      
          }
        } 
        .link-image-with-subforum{
 			padding-top:10px; 
          	img{
           	 height: 50px;      
          	}
	}
        .link-text {
          line-height: 20px;
          //height: 50px;
          p {
            margin-top: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            //white-space: nowrap;
            font-weight: bold;
            color:$text-color;
          }
        }
      }
    }
    .cm-hide-me {
      display: none;
    }
  }
  .cm-show-more {
    margin-bottom: 25px;
  }
}
.cm-change-color{
     color: $text-color;
}
.self-clear:after {
  content: "";
  clear: both;
  display: table;
}
.link-text {
  height: 50px;
  display: block; /* or inline-block */
  word-wrap: break-word;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: -webkit-inline-box;
  -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
}
.cm-subforum-seperator{
 margin: 0px;
 margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.fa-caret-right{
 margin-left:5px;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>community-browse-forum-tiles</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function(scope){
	$timeout = $injector.get('$timeout');
	$timeout(function(){
		$('.cm-minus').each(function(i){
			$(this).attr('tabindex',-1);
		});
	});
}]]></link><name>Community - Browse Forum Tiles</name><option_schema>[{"name":"rows_count","default_value":"2","label":"Number of rows displayed","type":"string"},{"name":"max_no_of_rows","default_value":"10","label":"Maximum number of forums displayed","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	/* populate the 'data' object */
	/* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */
		data.accessibilityOn = gs.getUser().getPreference("glide.ui.accessibility") == 'true';
		data.showBrowseCommunityForums = new CommunityUser().getReadableForums().length>0;
})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-19 15:20:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>da3c182f535032007a97e192d5dc3414</sys_id><sys_mod_count>230</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Community - Browse Forum Tiles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Communities" source="sn_communities">10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Communities">10809a9edb866200b1f6f78eaf961904</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_da3c182f535032007a97e192d5dc3414</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 10:02:05</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div data-ng-if="::c.data.showBrowseCommunityForums">
  <div class="cm-browse-forum-tiles self-clear" aria-label="${Browse Forums}">
    <h2 class="cm-header hidden-xs" data-ng-if="::!c.condensedMode">${Browse Forums}</h2>
    <h2 class="cm-header hidden-xs" data-ng-if="::c.condensedMode">${Browse Forums}
        <a href="Javascript:void(0);" role="button" data-ng-click="c.expandWidget()" class="cm-plus cm-change-color"><span class="sr-only">${Browse Forums}</span><i class="fa fa-plus" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="c.collapseWidget"></i></a>
        <a href="Javascript:void(0);" role="button" data-ng-click="c.expandWidget()" class="cm-minus cm-change-color"><span class="sr-only">${Browse Forums}</span><i class="fa fa-minus" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="!c.collapseWidget"></i></a>
    </h2>
    <h2 class="cm-header visible-xs">${Browse Forums}
        <a href="Javascript:void(0);" role="button" data-ng-click="c.expandWidget()" class="cm-plus cm-change-color"><span class="sr-only">${Browse Forums}</span><i class="fa fa-plus" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="c.collapseWidget"></i></a>
        <a href="Javascript:void(0);" role="button" data-ng-click="c.expandWidget()" class="cm-minus cm-change-color"><span class="sr-only">${Browse Forums}</span><i class="fa fa-minus" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="!c.collapseWidget"></i></a>
    </h2>
    <div class="cm-forum-tiles self-clear" data-ng-if="!c.collapseWidget">
      <ul class="cm-forum-list">
      <li class="col-xs-6 col-md-3 cm-tile-container" 
           data-ng-repeat="forum in ::c.forums track by forum.sys_id" data-ng-class="$index > (c.countToShow - 1) ? 'cm-hidden-tile cm-hide-me':''">
        <div class="panel panel-default forum-tile">
          <a href="?id=community_forum&sys_id={{::forum.sys_id}}" class="csm-link-inverse forum-tile-link">
              <div ng-class="(forum.subforumCount==0)?'link-image':'link-image-with-subforum'">
                <img data-ng-src="/{{::forum.forum_image}}" data-ng-if="::forum.forum_image" alt=""/>
              </div>
              <div class="link-text">
                <p ng-bind="::forum.name"></p>
              </div>
          </a>
            <hr class="cm-subforum-seperator" ng-if="forum.subforumCount>0">
            <div ng-if="forum.subforumCount>0">
              <a href="?id=community_forum_list&sys_id={{::forum.sys_id}}">
              <span ng-if="forum.subforumCount>1" > 
                <span ng-bind="forum.subforumCount"> </span> ${Sub Forums}
              </span>
              <span ng-if="forum.subforumCount==1" > 
                <span ng-bind="forum.subforumCount"> </span> ${Sub Forum}
              </span>
              <i class="fa fa-caret-right"></i>
              </a>
            </div>
        </div>
      </li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="cm-show-more self-clear" data-ng-if="!c.collapseWidget">
      <a href="?id=community_forum_list" class="">${View all Forums}</a>
    </div>
  </div>
  <style>
    @media screen and (min-width: 480px){
      .cm-browse-forum-tiles {
        width: 70%;
      }
    }
  </style>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>neel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-20 09:07:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>a20ebbd5dbd45410730a7b386896197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>aa0ebbd5dbd45410730a7b386896197a</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Titan Encircle" source="x_236494_titan_enc">fd74bb58db109010730a7b386896199e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Titan Encircle">fd74bb58db109010730a7b386896199e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_a20ebbd5dbd45410730a7b386896197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>neel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-20 09:07:38</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
